synopsis.p: Searches for discrimminating attributes with Weka.

description.p: applies Weka's attribute selection on a training set sepcified by and writes the result in .

param-doc.name: evaluator
param-doc.p: Evaluation metrics, this should be the canonical name of a class that extends Weka's ASEvaluation.

param-doc.name: search
param-doc.p: Search heuristic, this should be the canonical name of a class that extends Weka's ASSearch.

param-doc.name: active
param-doc.p: This expression is evaluated as a boolean with the corpus as the context element, the module will process the document only if the result is true.

param-doc.name: examples
param-doc.p: Training set examples. This expression is evaluated as a list of elements with the corpus as the context element.

param-doc.name: evaluationFile
param-doc.p: File where to write evaluation results.

param-doc.name: relationDefinition
param-doc.p: Specification of example attributes and class.

param-doc.name: userFunctions
param-doc.p: Set user functions available for this module. If this module is a sequence, then all compounds inherit its functions.
